mapper.sql: id, planTitle, beginTime, endTime, isFinish, isStart, createTime
mapper.insert: insert into jc_plan (id, planTitle, beginTime, endTime, isFinish, isStart, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plantitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isfinish,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isstart,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into jc_plan
id,
planTitle,
beginTime,
endTime,
isFinish,
isStart,
createTime,

mapper.update:
update jc_plan
planTitle = #{plantitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isFinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=BIT},
isStart = #{isstart,jdbcType=BIT},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jc_plan set planTitle = #{plantitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, beginTime = #{begintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isFinish = #{isfinish,jdbcType=BIT}, isStart = #{isstart,jdbcType=BIT}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from jc_plan order by createTime desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from jc_plan where isStart = 0 order by createTime desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from jc_plan order by createTime desc

select
from jc_plan where planTitle like #{planTitle} order by createTime limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}

select
from jc_plan where planTitle like #{planTitle} and isStart = 0 order by createTime limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from jc_plan where isStart = 0
select count(*) from jc_plan where planTitle like #{planTitle} and isStart = 0
